0.2.name: wordpress/grabber-widget
0.2.description:
The HTML Grabber Widget was developed by Acumen in order to provide a way to insert HTML from local or external webpages within your Wordpress pages.

Once the plugin is installed, you will have a new Widget shown in the Appearance section, which you'll be able to drag into your sidebar. From there, you can configure the page settings, including an xPath query to the element that you want to include in the sidebar.
